pullRequest.title: [#1450] adapted JavaBuilderState to change in field type of State.references
pullRequest.bodyText:
[#1450] adapted JavaBuilderState to change in field type of State.references
Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich christian.dietrich@itemis.de

nodes.bodyText: A comment with a version hint would be great.
I like that. Initially I though we'd have to dup the field, but having the two instanceof checks looks pretty clean - given the circumstances.
I was trying to understand what this code is supposed to do with the type locators, but failed until now to grasp it. So I appreciate the local change.
